bibl.title: Hellenistic Alexandria.
Jaimee P. UHLENBROCK, with contributions by several authors, The Coroplast's Art. Greek Terracottas of the Hellenistic World. An Exhibition and Publication in Honor of Dorothy Burr Thompson
bibl.author: CONNELLY, Joan B.

bibl.note: The distinction between the art of the court and the art of the street, attested in the corpus of minor arts, reflects a separation that was very real in Ptolemaic Alexandria.

Jaimee P. UHLENBROCK, with contributions by several authors, The Coroplast's Art. Greek Terracottas of the Hellenistic World. An Exhibition and Publication in Honor of Dorothy Burr Thompson (New Rochelle - New York, 1990) pp. 89-92, 1 fig.
